revised_title: On the Molybdates and Vanadates of Lead, and a New Mineral Eosite from Leadhills
tldr: The author investigates the molybdates and vanadates of lead, discovering a new mineral called eosite from Leadhills. Eosite is characterized by its saturated aurora-red color and unique crystal structure. The author also examines the paragenetic relations and chemical characters of eosite, providing insights into its formation and composition.
